body:
My prestige is glitched i am supposed to be prestige one but I'm prestige 2 and it ranks me with people in prestige one on the leader boards but says I'm prestige 2. I need help cuz I feel all the other people got their issues fixed but me >.< halp meh

I saw other people that had glitches fixed like people had prestige 11 and 6 and 15 and 8
I glitched but it hasn't been fixed but the others are back to normal

I tried Github btw and it was no help

title: Prestige Glitches 2 All

replies.body: I've told you already... its because you only have xp in nebula while they have xp in other gamemodes aswell... You have the correct xp and kills for your prestige, don't compare to other peoples stats
